page.title: 05CARS IN 1985.
page.content: We gathered information on new cars and secondhand cars by sending letters to garages.People buying new cars spend about Â£6,OOO.A new idea today in cars is a turbo engine and an injection engine which makes cars faster. The secondhand car most people buy is the Ford.Most people buy secondhand cars because new cars are too expensive.Secondhand cars lose their value every year.People buy small secondhand cars which don't use much petrol. Not many people walk to work in 1985.Motorbikes are common as well as cars.The price of petrol in July 1985 is Â£2.O5.
